page.shortlink: api a5 t from rfcdate function
page.description: Converts a time in RFC 822, RFC 850, RFC 1123 or ANSI C format to a time variable

argument.name: Date_Time_Value
argument.description: A date time value in the format: 03/30/0004 04:17:55 00 pm

page.discussion: The A5_T_FROM_RFCDATE() function converts a date time string in RFC 822, RFC 850, RFC 1123 or ANSI C formats to a Time variable. This function will automatically determine the format of the input string and handle the conversion appropriately.
page.example: dim t as T t = now() ? a5_t_from_rfcdate(a5_rfc822date(t)) = 03/30/0004 04:17:55 00 pm ? a5_t_from_rfcdate(a5_rfc850date(t)) = 03/30/0004 04:17:55 00 pm ? a5_t_from_rfcdate(a5_rfc1123date(t)) = 03/30/2004 04:17:55 00 pm ? a5_t_from_rfcdate(a5_ansidate(t)) = 03/30/2004 11:17:55 00 am
